      static org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f createInverseRotationMatrix(ImmutableVector3 eulerRotation)

      Changes the rotation part of the matrix to the inverse of the rotation part of the view matrix.

      • rotateMatrixTowardsCamera

        public static void rotateMatrixTowardsCamera(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f matrix,
                                             org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f viewMatrix)
        Changes the rotation part of the matrix to the inverse of the rotation part of the view matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to change.
        viewMatrix - The viewMatrix to use as reference to calculate the inverse rotation in the original matrix.

      • createTransformationMatrix

                                                                        ImmutableVector3 eulerRotation,

        Creates a matrix that contains the translation, rotation and scale properties.
        Parameters:
        translation - The position.
        eulerRotation - The Euler rotation in degrees.
        scale - The scale.
        Returns:
        A new transformation matrix.
